1.name: Gwoemul
1.description: A monster emerges from Seoul's Han River and begins attacking people. One victim's loving family does what it can to rescue her from its clutches.

2.name: The Departed
2.description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

3.name: Casino Royale
3.description: After earning 00 status and a licence to kill, Secret Agent James Bond sets out on his first mission as 007. Bond must defeat a private banker funding terrorists in a high-stakes game of poker at Casino Royale, Montenegro.

4.name: The Prestige
4.description: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.

5.description: King Leonidas of Sparta and a force of 300 men fight the Persians at Thermopylae in 480 B.C.

6.name: Pan's Labyrinth
6.description: In the Falangist Spain of 1944, the bookish young stepdaughter of a sadistic army officer escapes into an eerie but captivating fantasy world.

7.name: Cars
7.description: A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family.

8.name: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
8.description: A teenager becomes a major competitor in the world of drift racing after moving in with his father in Tokyo to avoid a jail sentence in America.

9.name: The Devil Wears Prada
9.description: A smart but sensible new graduate lands a job as an assistant to Miranda Priestly, the demanding editor-in-chief of a high fashion magazine.

10.name: Apocalypto
10.description: As the Mayan kingdom faces its decline, a young man is taken on a perilous journey to a world ruled by fear and oppression.

11.name: Gedo senki
11.description: In a mythical land, a man and a young boy investigate a series of unusual occurrences.

12.name: Blood Diamond
12.description: A fisherman, a smuggler, and a syndicate of businessmen match wits over the possession of a priceless diamond.

13.name: The Lives of Others
13.description: In 1984 East Berlin, an agent of the secret police, conducting surveillance on a writer and his lover, finds himself becoming increasingly absorbed by their lives.

14.name: The Pursuit of Happyness
14.description: A struggling salesman takes custody of his son as he's poised to begin a life-changing professional career.

15.name: Little Miss Sunshine
15.description: A family determined to get their young daughter into the finals of a beauty pageant take a cross-country trip in their VW bus.

16.name: Children of Men
16.description: In 2027, in a chaotic world in which women have become somehow infertile, a former activist agrees to help transport a miraculously pregnant woman to a sanctuary at sea.

17.name: Click
17.description: A workaholic architect finds a universal remote that allows him to fast-forward and rewind to different parts of his life. Complications arise when the remote starts to overrule his choices.

18.name: Mission: Impossible III
18.description: IMF Agent Ethan Hunt comes into conflict with a dangerous and sadistic arms dealer who threatens his life and his fiancee in response.

19.name: Idiocracy
19.description: Private Joe Bauers, the definition of "average American", is selected by the Pentagon to be the guinea pig for a top-secret hibernation program. Forgotten, he awakes five centuries in the future. He discovers a society so incredibly dumbed down that he's easily the most intelligent person alive.

20.name: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest
20.description: Jack Sparrow races to recover the heart of Davy Jones to avoid enslaving his soul to Jones' service, as other friends and foes seek the heart for their own agenda as well.

21.name: Babel
21.description: Tragedy strikes a married couple on vacation in the Moroccan desert, touching off an interlocking story involving four different families.

22.name: Zoom
22.description: Former superhero Jack is called back to work to transform an unlikely group of ragtag kids into superheroes at a private academy.

23.name: Black Snake Moan
23.description: A God-fearing bluesman takes to a wild young woman who, as a victim of childhood sexual abuse, looks everywhere for love, never quite finding it.

24.name: She's the Man
24.description: When her brother decides to ditch for a couple weeks, Viola heads over to his elite boarding school, disguised as him, and proceeds to fall for his school's star soccer player, and soon learns she's not the only one with romantic troubles.

25.name: Inside Man
25.description: A police detective, a bank robber, and a high-power broker enter high-stakes negotiations after the criminal's brilliant heist spirals into a hostage situation.

26.name: Marie Antoinette
26.description: The retelling of France's iconic but ill-fated queen, Marie Antoinette. From her betrothal and marriage to Louis XVI at 15 to her reign as queen at 19 and to the end of her reign as queen, and ultimately the fall of Versailles.

27.name: Night at the Museum
27.description: A newly recruited night security guard at the Museum of Natural History discovers that an ancient curse causes the animals and exhibits on display to come to life and wreak havoc.

28.name: John Tucker Must Die
28.description: Three ex-girlfriends of a serial cheater set up their former lover to fall for the new girl in town so they can watch him get his heart broken.

29.name: The Da Vinci Code
29.description: A murder inside the Louvre, and clues in Da Vinci paintings, lead to the discovery of a religious mystery protected by a secret society for two thousand years, which could shake the foundations of Christianity.

30.name: The Holiday
30.description: Two women troubled with guy-problems swap homes in each other's countries, where they each meet a local guy and fall in love.

31.name: Basic Instinct 2
31.description: Novelist Catherine Tramell is once again in trouble with the law, and Scotland Yard appoints psychiatrist Dr. Michael Glass to evaluate her. Though, like Detective Nick Curran before him, Glass is entranced by Tramell and lured into a seductive game.

32.name: Accepted
32.description: A high school slacker who's rejected by every school he applies to opts to create his own institution of higher learning, the South Harmon Institute of Technology, on a rundown piece of property near his hometown.

33.name: Superman Returns
33.description: Superman returns to Earth after spending five years in space examining his homeworld Krypton. But he finds things have changed while he was gone, and he must once again prove himself important to the world.

34.name: Silent Hill
34.description: A woman, Rose, goes in search for her adopted daughter within the confines of a strange, desolate town called Silent Hill.

35.name: The Hills Have Eyes
35.description: A family falls victim to a group of mutated cannibals in a desert far away from civilization.

36.name: Smokin' Aces
36.description: When a Las Vegas performer-turned-snitch named Buddy Israel decides to turn state's evidence and testify against the mob, it seems that a whole lot of people would like to make sure he's no longer breathing.

37.name: Borat: Cultural Learnings of America for Make Benefit Glorious Nation of Kazakhstan
37.description: Kazakh TV talking head Borat is dispatched to the United States to report on the greatest country in the world. With a documentary crew in tow, Borat becomes more interested in locating and marrying Pamela Anderson.

38.name: Final Destination 3
38.description: A student's premonition of a deadly rollercoaster ride saves her life and a lucky few, but not from Death itself, which seeks out those who escaped their fate.

39.name: Perfume: The Story of a Murderer
39.description: Jean-Baptiste Grenouille, born with a superior olfactory sense, creates the world's finest perfume. His work, however, takes a dark turn as he searches for the ultimate scent.

40.name: X-Men: The Last Stand
40.description: The human government develops a cure for mutations, and Jean Gray becomes a darker uncontrollable persona called the Phoenix who allies with Magneto, causing escalation into an all-out battle for the X-Men.

41.name: Grandma's Boy
41.description: A thirty-five-year-old video game tester has to move in with his grandma and her two old lady roommates.

42.name: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby
42.description: Number one NASCAR driver Ricky Bobby stays atop the heap thanks to a pact with his best friend and teammate, Cal Naughton, Jr. But when a French Formula One driver, makes his way up the ladder, Ricky Bobby's talent and devotion are put to the test.

43.name: The Black Dahlia
43.description: Two policemen see their personal and professional lives fall apart in the wake of the "Black Dahlia" murder investigation.

44.name: Little Children
44.description: The lives of two lovelorn spouses from separate marriages, a registered sex offender, and a disgraced ex-police officer intersect as they struggle to resist their vulnerabilities and temptations in suburban Massachusetts.

45.name: The Fountain
45.description: As a modern-day scientist, Tommy is struggling with mortality, desperately searching for the medical breakthrough that will save the life of his cancer-stricken wife, Izzi.

46.name: The Lake House
46.description: A lonely doctor, who once occupied an unusual lakeside house, begins exchanging love letters with its former resident, a frustrated architect. They must try to unravel the mystery behind their extraordinary romance before it's too late.

47.name: Cashback
47.description: After a painful breakup, Ben develops insomnia. To kill time, he starts working the late night shift at the local supermarket, where his artistic imagination runs wild.

48.name: Nacho Libre
48.description: Berated all his life by those around him, a monk follows his dream and dons a mask to moonlight as a Luchador (Mexican wrestler).

49.name: The Break-Up
49.description: In a bid to keep their luxurious condo from their significant other, a couple's break-up proceeds to get uglier and nastier by the moment.

50.name: Eragon
50.description: In his homeland of Alagaesia, a farm boy happens upon a dragon's egg -- a discovery that leads him on a predestined journey where he realizes he's the one person who can defend his home against an evil king.
